title: CSCL Script Design Workshop for Collaborative Learning Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic collaborative learning experience and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen competency in designing collaborative learning assessments in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three assessment techniques applicable to collaborative learning stages
Learners can create a CSCL assessment script based on IMS Learning Design standards
Learners can design and implement peer assessment activities using tablets/smartphones
Learners can propose blended assessment methods combining digital/analog evaluation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
